Row.Text: Fish Herder
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Fish.
City must have an improved source of Fish nearby.

Cattle Ranch
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Cattle.
Each source of [ICON_RES_COW] Cow worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of Cow nearby.

Fish Conglomerate
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Fish.
Each source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish worked by this City produces +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 Fish.[NEWLINE]City must have a Large Fish Market.
Crab Conglomerate
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Crab.

Each source of [ICON_RES_CRAB] Crab worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 Crab.[NEWLINE]City must have a Large Crab Market.Increases the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_GOLD] Gold produced by this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each successive Monopoly Building provides greater benefits.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 Crab Resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Large Crab Market Building.
